statements: SELECT * FROM quality_control;
SELECT inspection_result FROM quality_control;
SELECT * FROM quality_control WHERE inspection_result='Pass';
SELECT non_conformance FROM quality_control WHERE inspection_result='Fail';
SELECT inspection_result, non_conformance FROM quality_control ORDER BY inspection_result DESC;
SELECT * FROM quality_control WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass';
SELECT inspection_result, non_conformance FROM quality_control WHERE non_conformance = 'Major Issue' ORDER BY inspection_result DESC;
SELECT MAX(inspection_result) AS max_inspection_result, MIN(inspection_result) AS min_inspection_result FROM quality_control;
SELECT DISTINCT inspection_result, non_conformance FROM quality_control WHERE non_conformance IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(inspection_result) AS no_of_inspections FROM quality_control WHERE non_conformance LIKE '%Issue%';
SELECT * FROM inspections;
SELECT id, inspection_date, inspector_id FROM inspections WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass';
SELECT id, inspector_id, inspection_date, inspection_result FROM inspections WHERE inspector_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM non_conformances WHERE non_conformance_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY non_conformance_date DESC;
SELECT id, non_conformance_type FROM non_conformances WHERE non_conformance_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY non_conformance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM inspections WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, inspection_date, inspection_result FROM inspections WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY inspection_date ASC;
SELECT inspector_id, COUNT(id) AS total_inspections FROM inspections GROUP BY inspector_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 3 ORDER BY total_inspections DESC;
SELECT * FROM non_conformances WHERE non_conformance_type LIKE '%major%' ORDER BY non_conformance_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, non_conformance_type, non_conformance_description FROM non_conformances WHERE non_conformance_date <= '2022-05-31' ORDER BY non_conformance_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM inspections;
SELECT inspection_id, inspection_date FROM inspections WHERE inspector_id = 1;
SELECT inspector_name, inspector_email FROM inspectors WHERE inspector_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM non_conformances WHERE nc_id = 3;
SELECT inspection_id, inspection_date, inspection_result FROM inspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inspections WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass';
SELECT * FROM non_conformances WHERE action_taken LIKE '%resolved%';

SELECT inspectors.inspector_name, inspections.inspection_date, non_conformances.nc_description FROM inspectors JOIN inspections ON inspectors.inspector_id = inspections.inspector_id JOIN non_conformances ON inspections.inspection_id = non_conformances.inspection_id;

SELECT inspections.inspection_date, non_conformances.nc_description FROM inspections LEFT JOIN non_conformances ON inspections.inspection_id = non_conformances.inspection_id WHERE inspections.inspection_result = 'Fail';
SELECT inspectors.inspector_email FROM inspectors WHERE inspectors.inspector_id IN (SELECT inspector_id FROM inspections WHERE inspection_result = 'Fail');
SELECT * FROM inspections;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date FROM inspections WHERE result = 'Pass';
SELECT DISTINCT inspector_name FROM inspections;
SELECT * FROM non_conformances WHERE non_conformance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, location FROM departments ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT inspector_name, result FROM inspections WHERE result='Fail';
SELECT inspectors.name, inspectors.email, departments.name AS department FROM inspectors JOIN departments ON inspectors.id = departments.id;
SELECT inspection_date, inspector_name, result FROM inspections WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT inspections.id, COUNT(non_conformances.id) AS num_non_conformances FROM inspections LEFT JOIN non_conformances ON inspections.id = non_conformances.inspection_id GROUP BY inspections.id HAVING num_non_conformances > 1;
SELECT * FROM inspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT id, inspector_name, result FROM inspections WHERE result='Pass';
SELECT inspector_name, COUNT(*) AS total_inspections FROM inspections GROUP BY inspector_name;
SELECT * FROM non_conformances WHERE non_conformance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT name, description FROM products WHERE name LIKE '%software%';
SELECT * FROM inspections
SELECT id, inspector_name FROM inspections WHERE result='Pass'
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date FROM inspections WHERE inspection_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC
SELECT inspectors.name, departments.name FROM inspectors INNER JOIN departments ON inspectors.department = departments.id
SELECT inspections.inspector_name, non_conformances.description FROM inspections LEFT JOIN non_conformances ON inspections.id = non_conformances.id
